order_faqs.question: How does Try at Home work?
order_faqs.answer: You select a product category and request a trial. Our team brings a curated kit with multiple items to your location. You can try them at home and buy what you love!

order_faqs.question: Can I try a specific product from the app?
order_faqs.answer: We currently bring a full curated kit per category. You choose the category, and we bring a selection for you to try at home.

order_faqs.question: How many products can I try at once?
order_faqs.answer: You can try up to 4 product kits per visit (e.g., T-shirts, jeans, footwear, etc.). Each kit contains multiple handpicked items.

order_faqs.question: What happens after I select the products I like?
order_faqs.answer: Once you've made your choice, you can purchase directly via our shopper or pay online. The rest of the items are packed and returned.

order_faqs.question: Is there a charge for the Try at Home service?
order_faqs.answer: The visit is free, but we collect a small refundable deposit to confirm the slot. You only pay for the products you keep.

order_faqs.question: Can I return items after trying them?
order_faqs.answer: Since you try before you buy, there's no need for returns. However, exchange options may be available depending on our policy.

order_faqs.question: What if I don’t want to buy anything after the trial?
order_faqs.answer: No worries at all! You’re free to return all items. There’s no obligation to purchase.

order_faqs.question: How do I book a Try at Home visit?
order_faqs.answer: Just go to the ‘Try at Home’ tab in the app, choose categories you'd like to explore, and pick a time slot that works for you.

ways_to_earn.title: Book a Store Tour
ways_to_earn.sub_title: Get points for every store tour you book

ways_to_earn.title: Weekend Shopping Bonus
ways_to_earn.sub_title: Place an order this weekend for double points

ways_to_earn.title: Refer Friends
ways_to_earn.sub_title: Invite friends and earn when they join

order_faqs.question: Is my product available right now?
order_faqs.answer: Once you place an order, our personal shopper will confirm availability with the outlet.

order_faqs.question: What happens after I place the order?
order_faqs.answer: You’ll get a message once we confirm availability. You can chat with our shopper from the order page.

order_faqs.question: What if I place an order at night?
order_faqs.answer: Orders placed outside store hours (11 AM – 9 PM) will be confirmed the next morning.

order_faqs.question: Can I cancel after placing the order?
order_faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime before confirmation. Once confirmed, cancellation depends on store policies.

order_faqs.question: What is the return policy?
order_faqs.answer: Easy 1-day return for eligible items. Refunds are credited as Zulu Points.

order_faqs.question: How fast is delivery?
order_faqs.answer: We deliver within 100 minutes once your order is confirmed.

order_flow.text2: Give it a couple of mins
You will get it in 100 mins
You will get it in 100 mins
Let us get back to you
Our executive will soon be in touch
Our executive will soon be in touch
Money is back to your account

occasion_products.title: Casual shirts
occasion_products.sub-title: These products would make you the hotest in town swagger!!!

new_tour_statuses.notification_template: Your tour has been updated to TEMPLATE

tour_faqs.question: What is Zulu’s Mall Concierge service?
tour_faqs.answer: It’s a personal shopping experience from your favorite mall outlets — all from your phone! Just tell us what you’re looking for, and we’ll help you shop without stepping out.

tour_faqs.question: How does it work?
tour_faqs.answer:
• You book a tour for a specific outlet or category
• A personal shopper is assigned to you
• The shopper will message you on WhatsApp to understand your size and preferences
• They will show you products via images or a video call
• You choose what you like and place an order

tour_faqs.question: Can I ask for a specific brand or product?
tour_faqs.answer: Yes! Just mention the outlet, product, or category when booking, and we’ll try to find the best options for you.

tour_faqs.question: How do I confirm and place the order?
tour_faqs.answer: Once you’ve selected a product, just let the shopper know. They’ll confirm availability and get it delivered.

tour_faqs.question: How do I pay?
tour_faqs.answer: You can pay via UPI or a payment link after the product is delivered to you.

tour_faqs.question: Is there a delivery charge or minimum order?
tour_faqs.answer: There’s no delivery fee, but your order must be worth at least ₹1,000.

tour_faqs.question: Can I return or exchange the product?
tour_faqs.answer: Returns and exchanges depend on the store’s policy. The shopper will tell you the return rules before you buy.

how_it_works_faqs.title: Try at Home for ₹50
how_it_works_faqs.desc: Order up to 10 items in different styles and sizes. Only ₹50 per visit. No upfront product payment.

how_it_works_faqs.title: Get it in 100 mins
how_it_works_faqs.desc: Receive your order within 100 minutes, or schedule a time that works for you.

how_it_works_faqs.title: Try First, Pay Later
how_it_works_faqs.desc: Pay only for what you keep. No need to pay before trying.

how_it_works_faqs.title: Instant Returns
how_it_works_faqs.desc: Return what you don’t want to the rider immediately—no questions asked.

how_it_works_faqs.title: Authentic Products
how_it_works_faqs.desc: All items are 100% original, sourced directly from partner stores.
